IMPROVEMENTS: Users with *Manage Server* perms won't be ignored in ignored channels or even if they have roles that are being ignored by Bastion.
KILLED THESE BUGS: Killed a bug that posted the announcement messages, announced through announcement reactions, in the current channel instead of the announcement channel.
Killed another bug that prevented the `addWhitelistDomains` from working.
There was another bug that prevented the `stats` command from working if an invalid owner ID was set in the credentials. Killed that too!
